attributes.action: Give quangos' customers the right to vote management out or to shut it down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. There are quangos galore but few real ways of knowing which ones the public value and which they don't.
2. Each quango's customers should be asked every three years if they want management to go. Every five years they should be asked if the quango itself should go. 75% voting in favour should carry the day.
3. This would make quangos responsive to customers and provide service that is valued.
